levels.description: Puts up to <@ba.vup>{max_target}</> enemies in range to <$ba.sleep>Sleep</>, dealing <@ba.vup>{atk_scale:0%}</> ATK as Arts damage to the targets every <@ba.vup>{interval}</>s; defeating a target during the skill will summon <@ba.vup>{additional_token_cnt}</> additional Servants of Lamentation
